results.definition: an activity that you like or at which you are superior
examples: his bag now is learning to play golf

results.definition: a portable rectangular container for carrying clothes
examples: he carried his small bag onto the plane with him

results.definition: a place that the runner must touch before scoring
examples: he scrambled to get back to the bag

results.definition: a container used for carrying money and small personal items or accessories (especially by women)
examples: she reached into her bag and found a comb

results.definition: bulge out; form a bulge outward, or be so full as to appear to bulge
the quantity that a bag will hold
examples: he ate a large bag of popcorn

results.definition: mammary gland of bovids (cows and sheep and goats)

examples: he was romancing the old bag for her money

results.definition: a flexible container with a single opening
examples: he stuffed his laundry into a large bag

results.definition: capture or kill, as in hunting
hang loosely, like an empty bag

examples: The supermarket clerk bagged the groceries

results.definition: the quantity of game taken in a particular period (usually by one person)
